EmailTemplate.description: Sending the Calendar link to client CSP-2674
EmailTemplate.name: Send Calendar Link
EmailTemplate.subject: Schedule your call with The Knot! [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to follow up regarding your new online storefront. I’d like to set up a quick call to help get your Storefront up and running and go through the tools and resources you can now use to manage your leads.
To easily schedule a call at your convenience, I've included my personal calendar link: a link to my calendar. Please pick the date/time that works best for you.
Talk soon!
Tell me how I’m doing!
